annotations.description: Prometheus cannot scrape node_exporter for 2m. Investigate node reachability, service, port, firewall.
Availability is dropping sharply over 5m windows. Risk of missing SLO if sustained. Investigate immediately.
annotations.summary: Fast error budget burn (node monitoring availability)

annotations.description: Availability is degrading over longer windows. Investigate in business hours and reduce error budget consumption.
